title: Login page not responsive on mobile devices
description: The login form is not displaying correctly on mobile devices. The input fields are overlapping and the submit button is not visible on smaller screens. This affects user experience significantly and needs immediate attention.

title: Dashboard charts loading slowly
description: The analytics charts on the main dashboard are taking 10-15 seconds to load, causing poor user experience. Investigation shows the API queries are not optimized and may need caching implementation.

title: Add dark mode toggle to user preferences
description: Users have requested the ability to switch between light and dark themes. This should be implemented as a toggle in the user preferences section and persist across sessions.

title: Database connection timeout on high traffic
description: During peak hours, the application experiences database connection timeouts resulting in 500 errors for users. This appears to be related to connection pool configuration and needs immediate investigation.

title: Implement email notifications for issue updates
description: Team members should receive email notifications when issues assigned to them are updated, commented on, or have their status changed. This will improve team communication and issue tracking.

title: Fix broken file upload in project settings
description: Users are unable to upload project logos or documentation files through the project settings page. The upload button appears to be non-functional and no error messages are displayed.

title: Add search functionality to issue list
description: The current issue list doesn't have search capabilities, making it difficult to find specific issues in projects with many tickets. Implement search by title, assignee, and tags.

title: Update user profile validation rules
description: Current user profile form validation is too restrictive for international users. Need to update email validation and phone number formats to support global users properly.

title: Memory leak in real-time notification system
description: The real-time notification WebSocket connection is causing memory leaks in long-running browser sessions. Users report browser slowdown after several hours of usage.

title: Implement bulk actions for issue management
description: Team leads need the ability to perform bulk actions on multiple issues at once, such as changing status, reassigning, or adding tags. This will significantly improve workflow efficiency.

title: API rate limiting causing form submission failures
description: Users are experiencing form submission failures due to aggressive API rate limiting. The current limits are too restrictive for normal usage patterns and need adjustment.

title: Add keyboard shortcuts for common actions
description: Power users have requested keyboard shortcuts for common actions like creating new issues, navigating between sections, and quick status changes to improve productivity.
